>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

score activity credentials contribute to the passport score"},"identity_score":{"type":"number","nullable":false,"description":"The score identity credentials contribute to the passport score"},"skills_score":{"type":"number","nullable":false,"description":"The score skills credentials contribute to the passport score"},"calculating_score":{"type":"boolean","nullable":false,"description":"Flag indicating if the passport is calculating"},"connections_count":{"type":"integer","nullable":false,"description":"The number of connections of the passport"},"human_checkmark":{"type":"boolean","nullable":false,"description":"Flag indication if the passport has a human checkmark"},"last_calculated_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"The last time the passport score was calculated"},"main_wallet":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The main wallet of the passport"},"passport_id":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"The id of the passport"},"score":{"type":"number","nullable":true,"description":"The score of the passport"},"passport_profile":{"type":"object","nullable":false,"properties":{"bio":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The bio of the passport"},"display_name":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The display name of the passport"},"location":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The location of the passport"},"tags":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","description":"A tag describing the passport profile"}}}},"verified_wallets":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","description":"The connected wallets of the passport"}}}}},"pagination":{"type":"object","properties":{"current_page":{"type":"integer","description":"The current page of the fetched records"},"last_page":{"type":"integer","description":"The last page of records"},"total":{"type":"integer","description":"The total amount of records"}}}}}}}},"401":{"description":"unauthorized request"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
